bibl.title: Petition concerning a Theft: P. Berol. 7306.
bibl.note: Karanis, 12th February A.D. 100. - The table given pp. 112-119 contains complaints or notifications of theft and robbery dating to Roman and Byzantine times and addressed by private persons to various officials. - Will be republished in a future volume of the B.G.U.
Lukaszewicz Adam, Petition concerning a Theft: P. Berol. 7306.
